meanings.definition: Expressing or consisting of an exclamation or interjection.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an interjectory burst of joy.
meanings.sent5: The interjectory cheer echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: Used to interrupt or interject in a conversation.
meanings.sent1: Oops, I forgot to mention that.
meanings.sent2: Well, I think we should go now.
meanings.sent3: Interjectory, I have something important to say!
meanings.sent4: His sudden interjectory comment changed the whole discussion.
meanings.sent5: The interjectory pause made everyone look up in surprise.
